author: cbs8
title: Global Aircraft De-Icing Market 2015-2019
text:
ReportBuyer
LONDON , Oct. 12,
About aircraft de-icing market
The global aircraft de-icing market consists of three major products: de-icer trucks; snow blowers and sweepers; and de-icing chemicals and fluids. These products help in safe operation of an aircraft. Government organizations such as FAA have mandated the de-icing before flight operations to ensure safety of passengers and airlines.
Technavio's analysts forecast the global aircraft de-icing market to grow at a CAGR of 3.68% over the period 2014-2019.
Covered in this report
The report provides a comprehensive overview of the market shares, segmentation by product, and growth prospects by regions (the Americas, APAC, and EMEA), keeping commercial aircraft into consideration. It also presents the landscape of the market and a corresponding analysis of the five major vendors in the market.
In addition, the report discusses the primary drivers influencing the growth of the market. It also outlines the challenges faced by vendors and the market at large, as well as the key trends emerging in the market.
Technavio's report, Global Aircraft De-icing Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts.
